audioText: Avec ce nouveau guide de jardinage, mon voisin comprendra enfin comment cultiver ses légumes.
question: What will the neighbor finally understand?
options: How to choose the right soil.
explanation: The text states 'Avec ce nouveau guide de jardinage, mon voisin comprendra enfin comment cultiver ses légumes' - With this new gardening guide, my neighbor will finally understand how to grow his vegetables. 'Comprendra' is the future form of 'comprendre' (to understand), third person singular.
